#DevOps #Vacancy #Remote #Cloud #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞ #–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #–¥–µ–≤–æ–ø—Å #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π #–¥–µ–≤ #–¥–µ–≤–æ–ø—Å–µ—Ä #middle #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞
–í–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è: DevOps (Middle - Middle+)
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç: –£–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–Ω—ã–π(–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –Ω–∞ –ö–∞–ª—É–∂—Å–∫–æ–π)
–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: –ü–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è
–ó–ü: –æ—Ç 200 000 –¥–æ 250 000 —Ä—É–±–ª–µ–π

ContactPay Team –∏—â–µ—Ç DevOps-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è Middle –∏ –≤—ã—à–µ!

–ú—ã ‚Äì –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ø–∞ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ QIWI Plc, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç–µ–∂–Ω—É—é —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—É –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—â—É—é –≤ Google Cloud Platform. –ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω –ø–æ —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç—É PCI DSS.

–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π —Å—Ç–µ–∫:
–û–±–ª–∞–∫–æ & –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è: Google Cloud / Kubernetes / Helm / Docker
–ò–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞ –∫–∞–∫ –∫–æ–¥: Terraform
–ú–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ & –∞–ª–µ—Ä—Ç–∏–Ω–≥: Prometheus / Grafana / Alertmanager / Grafana OnCall
–ë–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö & –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å: PostgreSQL / Vault
–ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è: Python3 (Cloud Functions, —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç—ã)
–õ–æ–≥–∏ & –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–∞: Sentry
CI/CD & –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã: GitHub, Nginx, Linux (Debian)
–£–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞–º–∏: JIRA, Confluence, Slack, Notion

–ß–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:
–†–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—É—é –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞, –∞–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏—Ä—É—è –µ—ë –ø–æ–¥ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã–π —Ä—ã–Ω–æ–∫
–ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã –¥–µ–ø–ª–æ—è –∏ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
–ü—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –≤—ã–±–∏—Ä–∞—Ç—å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á
–£–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç—å –∏ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∏—Ä—É–µ–º–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã, –ø—Ä–µ–¥—É–ø—Ä–µ–∂–¥–∞—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ —Ç–æ—á–∫–∏ –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–∞
–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥, –∞–ª–µ—Ä—Ç–∏–Ω–≥ (Grafana OnCall) –∏ —Å–±–æ—Ä –º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫ –¥–ª—è –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤

–ö–æ–≥–æ –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º:
–û–ø—ã—Ç –≤ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–µ –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –¥–ª—è –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤
–£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–º–∏ (GCP, AWS), Kubernetes, Helm, Docker, Service Mesh
–ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–æ–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã
–û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ (Prometheus/Grafana) –∏ –∞–ª–µ—Ä—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–∞
–ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º: Python (–¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏), Terraform

–ß—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:
–ü–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ (–∏–ª–∏ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–µ)
–ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫
–ö–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞
–û—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§, "–±–µ–ª–∞—è" –ó–ü
–î–ú–° (–≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—é)
–ö–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞ –≤ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ

–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç: @vasinyaroslav

**Java-—Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∏ (Middle/Senior)**
**
–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è:** [–ü—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤–∞—è –ª–∞–±–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è Mish](https://mish.design/) ‚ù§
**–°—Ä–æ–∫ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è:** –æ—Ç 3-6 –º–µ—Å—è—Ü–µ–≤ —Å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –ø—Ä–æ–¥–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è

1‚É£ **–ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç: **–†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ-–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ —Å –ø–ª–∞–≥–∏–Ω–Ω–æ–π/–º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–æ–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–æ–π

**–¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è (Senior) 2 –ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç:**

**Senior Software Engineer **
At **Concordium**, we're on a mission to pioneer groundbreaking technology and shape the future. 
Join our Core Blockchain team as a Senior Software Engineer and be part of a team that's dedicated to pushing the boundaries of innovation to create solutions that make a lasting impact. 
Our core blockchain development team works in close cooperation with leading scientists and researchers to implement the next-generation trusted blockchain protocols. The work will cover all aspects of blockchain technology (including implementation of a smart contract language, cryptographic primitives and protocols, networking, consensus protocol, and databases) using technologies such as **Haskell** and **Rust**. 

It is an advantage if you have experience with one of these or similar technologies and languages. 

**Key Responsibilities**
*Contributing to the design, architecture, standards, code and operating processes that support our blockchain infrastructure including: 
    The Concordium blockchain node 
    The protocol, APIs and smart contract engine 
    SDKs 
    Blockchain scanners and other supporting tools 
*Developing technical specifications and system architecture documentation 
*Ensuring security, scalability, and performance of blockchain solutions 
*Collaborating with stakeholders to translate requirements into technical solutions 
*Providing technical mentorship and expertise within the team 

**Qualifications**
Our ideal candidate has some of the following abilities and experiences:
    Excellent communication and documentation skills
    English language level enough to work within the team
    Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities 
    Experience of working in teams using agile methodologies
    The ability to explain complex concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
    Understanding of distributed computing
    A good general understanding of programming languages and compiler tooling
    Strong understanding of distributed systems, P2P networks and consensus mechanisms
    Experience with building and maintaining automated CI/CD pipelines 
    Working knowledge of Haskell or Rust or similar languages
    Team leadership and mentoring capabilities

**What we offer**
A great challenge that will bring you to a new level as a professional
You have an impact & grow fast - we're a small team, you're always heard
Attractive salary (depending on your level, starting from $4,500) & VSOP

We're hiring: Junior DevOps Engineer at **Support Team** Getblock.io

**Team Overview**
The Technical Support team handles user inquiries and ensures that infrastructure and blockchain nodes remain operational and up-to-date. An essential part of the role is taking responsibility and clearly communicating the issue, its resolution, and preventive measures to avoid recurrence. While direct client communication is handled by the customer support team, the Technical Support Engineer works closely with them to address and resolve tickets effectively.

- Possesses basic communication skills to articulate, reason, and convey ideas clearly.

- Has skills in Bash, Python, and JavaScript.
- Has experience with orchestration systems like Nomad or Kubernetes.
- Is familiar with version control systems (GitLab, GitHub).

- Write configurations for launching new nodes.
- Handle node provisioning and decommissioning for users.
- Monitor service health: check node synchronisation, version currency, server status, etc.

- Fully remote work format

**About us**
Navixy, a platform developed by SquareGPS, has grown from its origins in Russia in 2009 into a global leader in Location and IoT solutions. As a part of the SquareGPS portfolio, Navixy functions both as a core product and as a distinct entity within the company, supporting over 30,000 fleets and 700 system integrators across 130 countries. Leveraging advanced technologies like GPS, LPWAN, BLE, smart vehicle trackers, and cloud computing, we focus on transforming complex technical capabilities into intuitive, actionable solutions to enhance fleet and field personnel operations.

**Role overview**
We are looking for a Fullstack Developer to take ownership of multiple interconnected web initiatives, which include our customer-facing website, client portal, and admin panel. We aim to create a consistent and seamless user experience, integrating modern technologies to support our evolving community and customer needs.

**Key responsibilities**
- Develop and maintain web applications for clients and platform administrators.
- Design intuitive user interfaces and work with headless CMS solutions.
- Develop backend services and integrate systems using APIs.
- Collaborate with designers, analysts, QA engineers, and other developers.
- Conduct code reviews and write tests to ensure code quality.
- Participate in architecture design and evaluate technical feasibility.

**Required qualifications**
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field
- 4+ years of experience in software development
- Strong knowledge of JavaScript (Vue.js, Nuxt.js), HTML, CSS
- Experience with headless CMS (e.g., Strapi)
- Backend development experience (Node.js, experience with PHP is beneficial)
- Experience working with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL)
- Russian (Native/C2) and English (B2) proficiency
- Experience with Agile methodologies
**
What we offer**
- Location: Belgrade, Serbia.
- Conditions: Hybrid work format with a 40-hour workweek (meeting in a coworking space once a week).
- Employment: Contract-based.
- Development: Opportunities for workshops, conferences, professional courses, and corporate English classes.
- Well-being: Access to psychological support service through ‚ÄúYasno.‚Äù
- Transparency and Growth: A culture of open feedback, with vertical and horizontal growth opportunities.
- Impact and Openness: Opportunity to see the results of your work, receiving timely feedback from the team, Lead, and HR.
- Corporate Culture: Online and offline events, team-building, experience exchange, and a young, vibrant team of professionals.
